author: jdm
title: All inclusive Pod
review:
The build as expected is uncomplicated and takes only a few minutes. The parts are all standard except for Kai himself - I believe this is the first time Kai appears in a white kimono outfit and the detailing is great. 

There are a few nice little details - the box snaps shut in a very satisfying way and keeps all the contents safe. There is a cool hologram on the front of the pod and nice decor inside. My kids both picked one up with a CMF minifig and just love it.

The pod is given away with any Ninjago purchase so even if you buy only one of the CMF then you come away with 2 for th eprice of 1 - a bargain in my mind and hours of playtime for the kids.
